amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that the policies of the Network could not be preempted by State or local law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-557 to ensure that the policies of the Network could not be thwarted or preempted by state or local law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luther amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 284 (Roll no. 100).
